page.title: 15Jobs in Cromford
page.content: We made a survey of parents' jobs in Cromford .We found that for Dads' jobs the third most common was{Office {Worker}with three examples,the second most common was{Builders}with five but by far the most common occupation was that of{Lorry drivers}with ten examples . We think this is because there are so many quarries locally. Surprisingly only three Dads were {un_employed.}For women we put part_time and full time together.{Shop {Owners}were the third most common with four examples,second came{teachers with six and most comman of all was {cleaners}with eleven!
